title: Mapping ecosystem services in Colombia: Analysis of synergies, trade-offs and bundles in environmental management
content:
Publication date: April 2024

Source: Ecosystem Services, Volume 66

Author(s): Aracely Burgos-Ayala, Amanda Jiménez-Aceituno, Megan Meacham, Daniel Rozas-Vásquez, María Mancilla García, Juan Rocha, Alexander Rincón-Ruíz
